item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting group tour to Italy!

Join your fellow club members May 13-19, 2012 on this exciting group trip to Italy! Explore the beauty of Tuscany and the splendor of Rome on this popular 7 day group tour to Italy. Join us as we explore the wonders of Florence, visit San Gimignano and participate in a fun cooking demonstration, enjoy wine tasting in the Chianti region, and witness the amazing history of Rome and the Vatican. This is a great group tour for those who wish to see Italy with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $1,975, pp plus airfare
(NO Single Supplement charge unless you specifically request a single room to yourself)

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this exciting adventure:
* Expert English speaking local guides
* Global Expeditions Club Leader
* Transportation and tours as indicated in modern a/c vehicle
* Tour to San Gimignano
* Italian cooking demonstration and lunch
* Wine tasting in the Chianti Region
* Guided tour of Florence
* Guided tour of Rome, the Vatican and Sistine Chapel
* Breakfast daily & 1 lunch
* European level 3-4 star hotels

Places Visited: Italy Group Tour, Florence Italy, Tuscany, San Gimignano, Chianti, Castello Verrazzano, Rome, Vatican, Sistine Chapel, St. Peter's Basilica, the Coliseum, Roman Forum, Piazza Navona, Pantheon, Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 15,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: Italy: A Group Tour of Rome & Tuscany - 7 Days
